title: "Ziggs can demolish low-health towers with Satchel Charge"
body:
What?!

Where is this, because it sounds awesome

replies.body: Should be available in the first 6.9 PBE update.
Is there anything you rioters can leak to me about VELKOZ?

ANYTHING????

(there are like 50 vel'koz mains who want your answers badly)
Sorry!  BelugaWhale is owning that project so I don't want to get ahead of his messaging.
Its the next PBE cycle that they _most likely_ will appear right? I heard they will be in cycle 6.9 and I hear 6.8 is ending soon on PBE
Are there any changes to Shaco being looked into or considered for the upcoming patches?
Like lowering the attack speed or damage of his boxes?
like allowing his boxes to stack like teemo ult or azir soldiers
where did this info come from though? Am I missing an update?
Pretty sure Meddler responded to a thread and brought it up.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oLwEYxMn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-14T18:01:08.846+0000)
>
> Should be available in the first 6.9 PBE update.

work on solo-q instead

ty

> [{quoted}](name=aliceandsven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oLwEYxMn,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-14T16:05:31.638+0000)
>
> What?!
> 
> Where is this, because it sounds awesome

Yeah, destroying the already paper towers even faster!

So healthy.
Where did you get this info?

Everyone complaining about towers;

Leave this god damn thread, it is for Ziggs, not your constant whining, you spam the Boards enough with your copy-pasted whining so please stay in your own threads.

Nice, Ziggs might make a return as the tower destroyer again. Just about the only champ that could break towers quicker than a Jinx or Tristana. I always loved playing Ziggs before and taking mid tower by like 10 minutes, or getting Lichbane and doing 1/4 its hp every passive Lichbane hit.
Old rengar was best. Currently xin zhao and stacked nasus probablt.
Old Yi, the true dunkmaster.
3Q rengar ate turrets harder.
Nothing beats Trundle chomping away on them.

> [{quoted}](name=Rendarkan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oLwEYxMn,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-15T01:48:56.567+0000)
>
> Nothing beats Trundle chomping away on them.

you know that trundles Q no longer affects turrets right....
that was removed awhile back
I know it was. Just saying that nothing beats him chomping on it.
Tahm kench, lissandra, kennen...

> [{quoted}](name=Shonjl,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oLwEYxMn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-14T18:17:13.211+0000)
>
> Nice, Ziggs might make a return as the tower destroyer again. Just about the only champ that could break towers quicker than a Jinx or Tristana. I always loved playing Ziggs before and taking mid tower by like 10 minutes, or getting Lichbane and doing 1/4 its hp every passive Lichbane hit.

Lich bane+passive+45% cdr+mana
tower?what tower?

Can his Q hitbox also get a little love? The thing is impossible to hit, especially with all the move speed running around like swifties, deadman's, ludens, and other items.

Additionally more mobile champs have been released since the nerf, and they are currently meta.

Current Ziggs changes are:

Passive
- Increased damage
- Lower cool down
W
- Can now execute towers
R
- Lower cool down
- No longer deals double damage to minions
great idea, add another way to destroy tower as if they arent weak enough.

As if towers weren't weak enough...

Good idea though, I like when the character is reflected in their abilities.
